title: Delhi Child Rape: When an old tweet came back to haunt CM Arvind Kejriwal
text:
File Photo There’s a not-so-old saying which we just made up which goes: “Think before you Tweet, because even deleted Tweets survive for all eternity, and because there are thousands of people waiting to mock you about it.” Various celebrities and politicians have experienced ridicule for their old tweets, and now it’s Arvind Kejriwal’s turn to face the online outrage.
On 26 July 2013, Arvind Kejriwal had tweeted: “Sheila Dikshit's response after each rape - "what can I do? Delhi police not in my control." Do we want such a helpless CM?”
Sheila Dikshit's response after each rape - "what can I do? Delhi police not in my control." Do we want such a helpless CM?
— Arvind Kejriwal (@ArvindKejriwal) June 27, 2013
Now, on 17 October 2015, the Delhi Chief Minister reacted to the rape of two minors in the capital by lashing out at the Central Government and LG Najeeb Jung. He tweeted on October 17, 2015 after he had become the Delhi CM, he tweeted: “Repeated rape of minors is shameful and worrying. Delhi police has completely failed to provide safety. What are PM n his LG doing?” (Read: Arvind playing shallow politics: BJP )
Repeated rape of minors is shameful and worrying. Delhi police has completely failed to provide safety. What are PM n his LG doing?
— Arvind Kejriwal (@ArvindKejriwal) October 17, 2015
PM Modi shud either himslf act or give control over Delhi police n public order to elected govt of delhi या खुद करो या दूसरों को करने दो
— Arvind Kejriwal (@ArvindKejriwal) October 17, 2015
Obviously this led some on Twitter to remind Arvind of his old tweets:
Pic 1 @ArvindKejriwal sir in 2013 Pic 2 @ArvindKejriwal sir in 2015 No responsibility then no responsibility nw pic.twitter.com/mGS7u46py4
— sumedha bellary (@sudhica84) October 17, 2015
To grab power, @ArvindKejriwal politicized rapes. Now using theatrics failing to deliver on promised security to women #DelhiCriesHelplessCM
— Gaurav Pandhi (@GauravPandhi) October 17, 2015
Hope now both @narendramodi & @ArvindKejriwal realize that politicizing a societal issue like rape was in poor taste pic.twitter.com/zBjYlxHF7q
— Scotchy (@scotchism) October 17, 2015
CM Sir, do you remember your tweet on 'HelplessCM' for Sheila Ji after rape incidents? If not, look at attached pic- pic.twitter.com/bEqXDaNuj3
— Ajay Maken (@ajaymaken) October 17, 2015
